contest-event.event-date:
April 30, 1932 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Test Piece Contest
Undine
Holmfirth, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £12, 3rd £9, 4th £6, 5th £3. March contest(Boadicea) - 1st(£3) Sowerby Bridge, 2nd(£2) Bentley Colliery. 12th annual contest. 13 bands competed
April 4, 2012, 9:08 p.m. Dec. 20, 2018, 5:11 p.m.
1 Bentley Colliery William Halliwell
2 Hade Edge William Pollard
3 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Noel Thorpe

5 Slaithwaite Band Noel Thorpe
